set_value.name: $ObjectTable
set_value.exact:
table[ {1} = table [ $Return = Debug_Warp, $Name = 'Debug Warp', $Description = 'warp to any sector, sector lookup is dynamic', ], {2} = table [ $Return = DFA_Create_Menu, $Name = 'Create Ship', $Description = 'create any ship, ship lookup is dynamic', ], {3} = table [ $Return = Add_Research, $Name = 'Add Research', $Description = 'add all research, research lookup is dynamic', ], {4} = table [ $Return = Add_Blueprints, $Name = 'Add Blueprints', $Description = 'add all blueprints, blueprints lookup is dynamic', ], {5} = table [ $Return = Add_Inventory, $Name = 'Add Inventory', $Description = 'add one of every inventory item lookup is dynamic', ], {6} = table [ $Return = Player_Position, $Name = 'Player Position', $Description = 'submenu to help visualize placement of objects in the cluster', ], {7} = table [ $Return = Create_Object_Menu, $Name = 'Create Object', $Description = 'runs create_object on anything with a ware and a macro NOTE: create_object cannot actually create many of the objects in the game fitting this criteria', ], {8} = table [ $Return = Display_Galaxy_State, $Name = 'Display Galaxy', $Description = 'display the owners and amounts of ships, stations and sectors throughout the galaxy', ], {9} = table [ $Return = Add_Faction_Rep, $Name = 'Add Faction Rep And License', $Description = 'adds maximum faction rep and all licences, faction lookup is dynamic', ], {10} = table [ $Return = Add_Money, $Name = 'Add Money', $Description = 'adds 5000000000Cr to the player from the argon account', ], {11} = table [ $Return = DropDownTest, $Name = 'Dropdown', $Description = ' ', ], {12} = table [ $Return = Reveal_Map, $Name = 'Reveal Map', $Description = 'dynamic reveal of sectors', ], {13} = table [ $Return = Bad_Sector_Art, $Name = 'Bad_Sector_Art', $Description = 'print sector and position', ], {14} = table [ $Return = Calc_Pos_Good, $Name = 'Calc_Pos_Good', $Description = 'print sector and position', ], {15} = table [ $Return = Print_Stuff, $Name = 'Print_Stuff', $Description = 'print stuff is actually a good descriptor', ], {16} = table [ $Return = Find_Thing, $Name = 'Find_Thing', $Description = 'edit code in xreborn_debug/md/xreborn_debug_menu.xml to find something and warp to it', ],
]

debug_to_file.text:
' GOOD sector: %s sector macro: %s\n (player.zone + player.sector): %s\n '.[ player.sector.knownname, player.sector.macro, player.zone.position + player.sector.position,
]
debug_to_file.name: 'position_calced.log'

debug_to_file.text:
' BAD SECTOR ART sector: %s sector macro: %s\n (player.zone + player.sector): %s\n '.[ player.sector.knownname, player.sector.macro, player.zone.position + player.sector.position,
]
debug_to_file.name: 'position_calced.log'

debug_to_file.text:
' sector: %s sector macro: %s\n (player.zone + player.sector): %s\n '.[ player.sector.knownname, player.sector.macro, player.zone.position + player.sector.position,
]
debug_to_file.name: 'position_calced.log'
'position.log'

set_value.name: $ObjectTable
set_value.exact: table[ {1} = table [ $Name = 'player.ship.position', $Position = player.ship.position, ], {2} = table [ $Name = 'player.ship.zone.position', $Position = player.ship.zone.position, ], {3} = table [ $Name = 'player.ship.sector.position', $Position = player.ship.sector.position, ], {4} = table [ $Name = 'player.ship.cluster.position', $Position = player.ship.cluster.position, ], {5} = table [ $Name = 'TransformPosition 30000km', $Return = TransformPosition5, ], {6} = table [ $Name = 'TransformPosition 20000km', $Return = TransformPosition6, ], {7} = table [ $Name = 'TransformPosition 10000km', $Return = TransformPosition7, ], {8} = table [ $Name = 'TransformPosition 1000km', $Return = TransformPosition8, ], {9} = table [ $Name = 'Calc Position', $Return = Calc_Position, ], ]
